subject: Simsonn HS Pro Shifter
description_text:
Hi.

I am wondering will you have this new shifter available on AliExpress?

Also, do you have any videos of this shifter?

Also, when I try to order it, discount codes for new racers or black friday
do not work for this shifter on your website.

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Kris Bijan,  Since pre-sale is not supported on AliExpress, this product is expected to go on sale on December 15. Currently, our independent website offers it as a pre-sale.Â
